catalog_info.title: Tutorial - Sophomore Year
catalog_info.notes: One term required of all Economics concentrators. Enrollment limited to concentrators. Has an introductory meeting. Meets in assigned section thereafter.
catalog_info.prereq: Prerequisite: (Statistics 100 OR Statistics 104 OR Statistics 110) AND (Economics 1010a OR Economics 1011a)
catalog_info.description: A series of seminars taught in small sections focusing on applications of economic theory to real problems.
